body:
Comment 2: 
Go variables are always initialized, either explicitly, or to a default of the zero
value for the type. Slices, channels, and maps are set to nil. len() and cap() are
integers, so they are set to 0.

Variable declarations, The Go Programming Language
http://golang.org/doc/go_spec.html#Variable_declarations

The zero value, The Go Programming Language
http://golang.org/doc/go_spec.html#The_zero_value
